amendment.description: Amendment limits loan guarantees for international railroad projects until studies relating to criminal activities have been completed and made available to the public.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill to be made available for a new loan gurantee commitment for any railroad project when it is made known that such a project is an international railroad bordering another country unless a comprhensive study has been conducted regarding criminal activities that have occurred on existing railroads of a similar type.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
